<h1 align="center">
  Frontend Masters: Introduction to Gatsby
</h1>

[![Netlify Status](https://api.netlify.com/api/v1/badges/de73d7cf-4ee4-4360-a575-7e660adbb6ea/deploy-status)](https://app.netlify.com/sites/wykhuh-fem-gatsby-intro/deploys)

[demo app](https://wykhuh-fem-gatsby-intro.netlify.com)

## Installation Instructions

1. `npm install`
1. `npm run develop`
1. Open http://localhost:8000/

[Course Slides](https://jlengstorf.github.io/presentations/workshop-gatsby-mdx-blog/#/) (hit the right/down arrow keys to progress through the slides)

## Prerequisites

1. Have the Gatsby CLI (gatsby-cli) installed globally by running:
`npm install -g gatsby-cli`
